text: Sphingomonas pituitosa is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming, rod-shaped and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from water from a eutrophic artificial spring in Austria.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt Sphingomonas pituitosa produces exopolysaccharide. == Further reading == * * * * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas pituitosa at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase phyllosphaerae Category:Bacteria described in 2001
title: Sphingomonas pituitosa
